text: inna enzelne-ttevrate fiha hudev venur. yahkumu bihe-nnebiyyune-llezine eslemu lillezine hadu verrabbaniyyune vel'ahbaru bime-stuhfizu min kitabi-llahi vekanu `aleyhi suheda'. fela tahsevu-nnase vahsevni vela testeru biayati semenen kalila. vemel lem yahkum bima enzele-llahu feulaike humu-lkafirun
